member.name: T:Accord.Audio.Formats.IAudioDecoder
member.summary: Audio decoder interface, which specifies set of methods that should be implemented by audio decoders for different file formats.

member.name: M:Accord.Audio.Formats.IAudioDecoder.Open(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Open specified stream.
member.param: Stream to open.
member.returns: Returns number of frames found in the specified stream.

remarks.para: Implementation of this method is supposed to read audio's header, checking for correct audio format and reading its atributes.

Implementations of this method may throw exception to report about unrecognized audio format, exception to report about incorrectly formatted audio or exception to report if certain formats are not supported.

member.name: M:Accord.Audio.Formats.IAudioDecoder.Decode
member.summary: Decode all frames.
member.remarks: Implementations of this method may throw exception in the case if no audio stream was opened previously, in the case if stream does not contain frame with specified index or exception to report about incorrectly formatted audio.

member.name: M:Accord.Audio.Formats.IAudioDecoder.Decode(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decode a number of frames.
member.param: Audio frame index to start decoding.
The number of frames to decode.
member.remarks: Implementations of this method may throw exception in the case if no audio stream was opened previously, in the case if stream does not contain frame with specified index or exception to report about incorrectly formatted audio.

member.name: M:Accord.Audio.Formats.IAudioDecoder.Close
member.summary: Close decoding of previously opened stream.

remarks.para: Implementations of this method don't close stream itself, but just close decoding cleaning all associated data with it.
